def_cn: 不墨守成规的;不遵循主流思想的
def_en: If you say that someone's way of life or opinions are nonconformist, you mean that they are different from those of most people.

def_cn: (英国)不信奉英国国教的，不遵奉圣公会的
def_en: In Britain, nonconformist churches are Protestant churches which are not part of the Church of England.
